trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> objects within a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>控制項設計工具中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class, and any derived class, uses the DesignerRegionCollection class to contain and enumerate the designer regions for the control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別和任何衍生的類別，會使用 DesignerRegionCollection 類別以包含，例如列舉在設計主機中，控制項將設計工具區域[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can be used to define and add regions to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法可以用來定義，並將區域加入至集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Owner%2A> property to access the control designer object that contains the designer region collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Owner%2A>屬性來存取控制項設計工具物件，其中包含設計工具區域集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Owner%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerRegionCollection methods and properties to examine and maintain the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> objects that are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DesignerRegionCollection 方法和屬性來檢查及維護<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>集合中的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: The collection dynamically increases as objects are added.
trans-unit.target: 集合會動態增加加入物件時。

trans-unit.source: Indexes in this collection are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的索引都以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A> property to determine how many designer regions are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>屬性來判斷多少的設計工具區域集合中。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerRegionCollection members to provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A> method to add a single designer region to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DesignerRegionCollection 成員提供下列功能:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>方法，將單一的設計工具區域加入至集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a designer region at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A>方法，將設計工具區域集合內的特定索引處。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a designer region.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A>方法移除設計工具區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the designer region at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法移除特定索引處的設計工具區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a particular designer region is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Contains%2A>方法，以判斷特定的設計工具區域已經位於集合中。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to retrieve the index of a designer region within the collection.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法來擷取設計工具區域集合中的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Item%2A> indexer to get or set the designer region at a particular index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Item%2A>索引子以取得或設定設計工具區域的特定的索引，使用陣列標記法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all designer regions from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A>方法從集合中移除所有設計工具區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the DesignerRegionCollection constructor to create an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 DesignerRegionCollection 建構函式來建立空的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add elements to the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將項目加入集合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> class for the specified control designer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>類別指定的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerRegionCollection constructor creates an empty collection and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Owner%2A> property to the specified control designer object.
trans-unit.target: DesignerRegionCollection 建構函式會建立空的集合，並設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Owner%2A>屬性指定的控制項設計工具物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Owner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses the DesignerRegionCollection constructor to initialize a designer region collection for a specific control designer.
trans-unit.target: 視覺設計工具，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，會使用 DesignerRegionCollection 建構函式初始化特定控制項設計工具的設計工具區域集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add elements to the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將項目加入集合使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control designer that owns this collection of designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 擁有此集合設計工具區域的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>物件集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法將指定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件集合的結尾。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件至集合中的指定索引位置，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref>来加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the region was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 區域加入集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes all regions from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有區域。

trans-unit.source: Use the Clear method to remove all regions from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除所有區域使用清除方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific region from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合移除的特定區域，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove a region at a particular index, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定索引處的區域，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified region is contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在集合中包含指定的區域。

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contains 方法判斷使用等號比較<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Contains method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Contains 方法執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.
trans-unit.target: 由於樣板區域集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能不重要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> to locate within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref>找出集合中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the region is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果區域是在集合中，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an <xref:System.Array> object, starting at a particular <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: 該集合的項目複製<xref:System.Array>物件，開始在特定<xref:System.Array>索引。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> method to add the design regions to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A>方法來加入設計區域，以<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the copied regions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>也就是複製區域的目的地。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>必須有以零為起始的索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Count 屬性通常用於逐一查看集合中的物件時決定上限索引。

trans-unit.source: Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.
trans-unit.target: 第一個項目集合的索引是以零為起始的因為是在索引`0`和最後一個項目是在索引`Count-1`。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A> property together with a loop construct, such as `while`, `for`, or `foreach` statements, to enumerate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>屬性和迴圈建構，例如`while`， `for`，或`foreach`陳述式，以列舉<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，可用來逐一查看集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>物件在集合中的。

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> objects.
trans-unit.target: IndexOf 方法判斷使用等號比較<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: IndexOf 方法執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.
trans-unit.target: 由於樣板區域集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能不重要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> to locate within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref>找出集合中。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of region within the collection; otherwise, -1, if region is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 第一個出現的以零為起始的索引 region 內集合; 否則為-1，如果 region 不在集合中。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> object into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 插入<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>集合中指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Insert method adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object to the collection at a specific index location.
trans-unit.target: Insert 方法會將<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>集合中特定的索引位置的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: To add a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> to the end of the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要新增單一<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>集合的結尾，以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you insert an item into the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 索引時將項目插入集合時，會變更後續項目集合中。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the collection at which to insert the region.
trans-unit.target: 要插入在區域集合中以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref>来插入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> object has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>物件具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the size of the collection cannot be changed by adding or removing items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果無法藉由新增或移除項目; 變更集合的大小否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>物件是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the collection cannot be changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果無法變更集合。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> object is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>物件為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically.
trans-unit.target: 不在本質上是安全執行緒程序列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改集合。

trans-unit.source: This causes exceptions during enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別造成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Lock the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 使用中鎖定集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>保證的執行緒安全，以在整個列舉過程的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>已同步處理，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>集合中指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Item indexer to retrieve the region at the specified index within the collection or to set the region at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 擷取集合中的指定索引處的區域，或集合內指定索引處設定的區域，請使用項目的索引子。

trans-unit.source: You can index elements in the collection by using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用陣列標記法索引集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `DesignerRegions(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `DesignerRegions[i]` for C#.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以建立索引的索引處的項目`i`加上標記法`DesignerRegions(i)`如 Microsoft VisualBasic 或`DesignerRegions[i]`C#。

trans-unit.source: When you have a reference to the region object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您有區域物件的參考，而且需要在集合中物件的索引時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> to get or set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>来取得或設定集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref>集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control designer that owns the designer region collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項設計工具擁有設計工具區域集合。

trans-unit.source: The Owner property provides a convenient means to access the control designer object for a designer region collection.
trans-unit.target: 擁有者屬性提供方便的方式存取設計工具區域集合的控制項設計工具物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Owner property to determine the type of control designer that owns the collection and to access the properties and methods of the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用的擁有者屬性來判斷擁有集合的控制項設計工具的型別，以及存取的屬性和方法的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref> that represents the control designer that owns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"> </xref> ，代表控制項設計工具擁有<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Remove method removes the first occurrence of the specified region from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove 方法從集合中移除第一個出現的指定區域。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> object does not contain the specified `region`, the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>物件不包含指定`region`，集合維持不變。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The Remove method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove 方法判斷使用等號比較<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Remove method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Remove 方法執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.
trans-unit.target: 由於樣板區域集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能不重要。

trans-unit.source: To remove a region at a particular index from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除特定索引處的區域，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove all regions from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除所有區域，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 索引時從集合中移除項目會變更後續項目集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref>若要從集合中移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> object at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>集合內指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove a region at a particular index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用於 RemoveAt 方法從集合中移除特定索引處的區域。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specified region from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除指定的區域，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove all regions from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從集合中移除所有區域，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 索引時從集合中移除項目會變更後續項目集合中。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 在集合內以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically.
trans-unit.target: 不在本質上是安全執行緒程序列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改集合。

trans-unit.source: This causes exceptions during enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別造成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Lock the collection by using the SyncRoot method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定集合，使用在整個列舉過程的 syncroot 同步方法，以確保執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需鎖定集合中的執行緒安全的存取詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the copied regions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>也就是複製區域的目的地。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>必須有以零為起始的索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。

trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the collection of the object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之物件的集合中以零為起始的索引。
